course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Critical Steps to Successful Technology Startups
course.description: This course is intended for students who want to seriously pursue technology startups. We will work with students to identify critical steps and important milestones associated with each step in order to develop a sound business plan for a technology startup. These include team buildups, market identification and research, project proposal, technology and supply chain evaluation and prototype development. Company visits, field trips, trade shows and interactions with experienced entrepreneurs will be arranged. Students with good performance in this course are recommended to proceed to the next course in the series, which is a comprehensive project-based design course to realize major goals set forth in the business plan and eventually to kick-off their own startups. Instructorâ€™s approval is required. Graded P or F.
